title: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description:
The Modify Parameters dialog has some issues that need to be addressed:
- The name duplication validation is not performed on the first page.
- The first and second columns in the dialog should be merged.
- The marking between the button and list is too large.
- The top button should be aligned with the top of the dialog.
- The table in the dialog should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic.
- Multiple selection should be allowed in the table as move up/down can be applied on more than one item.
- The signature preview must be a label that wraps.
- It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.
OB:
The marking between the button and list is too large.
The top button is not aligned with the top of the dialog.
The table in the dialog does not have a label.
Multiple selection is not allowed in the table.
The signature preview does not wrap.
The signature preview does not have the same background color as a hover.
EB:
The marking between the button and list should be smaller.
The top button should be aligned with the top of the dialog.
The table in the dialog should have a label.
Multiple selection should be allowed in the table.
The signature preview should wrap.
The signature preview should have the same background color as a hover.
SR:
1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog.
2. Observe the space between the button and list.
3. Check the alignment of the top button.
4. Look for a label for the table in the dialog.
5. Try to select multiple items in the table.
6. Check the wrapping of the signature preview.
7. Compare the background color of the signature preview with a hover state.
